Row.Text: City-Stater
Kingdom of Natural Wealth
+3 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resources in Settlements adjacent to Coast.

[BLIST][LI][B]+3 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold[/B] on [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] [B]Resources[/B] in Settlements adjacent to [B]Coast[/B].[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production[/B] towards constructing the [B]Great Stele[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Aksum's associated Wonder.
Gifts of Osiris
+2 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvements and [icon:CITY_URBAN] Districts on Navigable Rivers.

[BLIST][LI][B]+2 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production[/B] on [icon:CITY_RURAL] [B]Improvements[/B] and [icon:CITY_URBAN] [B]Districts[/B] on [B]Navigable Rivers[/B].[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production[/B] towards constructing the [B]Pyramids[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Egypt's associated [icon:WONDER] Wonder.
Demokratia
+3 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence on the Palace.
[BLIST][LI][B]+3 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence [/B]on the [B]Palace[/B].[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing the [B]Oracle[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Greece's associated[icon:WONDER] Wonder.
Nine Provinces
The [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital and new [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns gain an additional [icon:YIELD_POPULATION] Population with their first growth event.

[BLIST][LI]The [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] [B]Capital [/B]and new [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] [B]Towns [/B]gain an additional [icon:YIELD_POPULATION] [B]Population [/B]with their first growth event.[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing [B]Weiyang Palace[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Han's associated [icon:WONDER] Wonder.
Ksekam Chamnon
[icon:CITY_URBAN] Districts on Rivers do not remove the natural yield of the tile.

[BLIST][LI][icon:CITY_URBAN] [B]Districts [/B]on [B]Rivers [/B]do not remove the [B]natural yield [/B]of the tile.[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing [B]Angkor Wat[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Khmer's associated [icon:WONDER] Wonder.
Dhamma Lipi
You can choose an additional [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Pantheon after unlocking the [icon:RADIAL_CIVICS] Civic Mysticism.

[BLIST][LI]You can choose an additional [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] [B]Pantheon [/B]after unlocking the [icon:RADIAL_CIVICS] [B]Civic Mysticism[/B].[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing [B]Sanchi Stupa[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Maurya's associated [icon:WONDER] Wonder.
Skies of Itzamna
The Palace gains +0.5 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science for adjacent [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Vegetated Terrain.

[BLIST][LI]The [B]Palace [/B]gains [B]+0.5 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science [/B]for adjacent [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] [B]Vegetated Terrain[/B].[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing [B]Mundo Perdido[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Maya's associated [icon:WONDER] Wonder.
Goose Societies
All [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings receive a +1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food Adjacency for [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resources.

[BLIST][LI]All [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] [B]Buildings [/B]receive a [B]+1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food Adjacency [/B]for [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] [B]Resources[/B].[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing [B]Monks Mound[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Mississippian's associated [icon:WONDER] Wonder.
Hamarana Council
+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Infantry Units when attacking.

[BLIST][LI][B]+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength [/B]for [B]Infantry Units [/B]when attacking.[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing the [B]Gate of All Nations[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Persia's associated [icon:WONDER] Wonder.
Twelve Tables
+1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:CITY_URBAN] Districts in the [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital and City Centers in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

[BLIST][LI][B]+1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture [/B]on [icon:CITY_URBAN] [B]Districts [/B]in the [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] [B]Capital [/B]and [B]City Centers [/B]in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] [B]Towns[/B].[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing the [B]Colosseum[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Rome's associated [icon:WONDER] Wonder.
